page.title: 18My House
page.content: I live at 16 Raby street,it is a terraced house.My house is made from stone & the roof is made from slates. We have a bay window at the front.In our house we have two bedrooms,a living room,a dining room,a kitchen and a bathroom which is an extension. We also have a hall.We have running water in the bathroom and in the kitchen.We have two gas fires one in the living room and we have a gas cooker we also have electricity.We have a little flower garden in the front and a back yard.Our house is not rented,we own it.We own a car but we do not have a garage.We do not have central heating.I have the warmest bedroom.In my family there is my mam, my dad,my brother,my cat and me.
